A careless admin reused one prime to create two RSA keys. Find the secret flag in 383156211816678983389275473613063567744660779324451990822330384877775004587658839226737088084616749567504224458218696008242326579195246905934525937587125257507868610607898079885107069198866427948319385427953594739627885412066120988 by exploiting the repeated prime vulnerability!

The flag format is flag{...}
n=612791716612396640556348893820829603210918281714267892829615255144300221245964882200958260222074257882858916318156072604739971428551225636436021634969328489033996757009589261386075700506668240578406025521936713510077874960613243849, e=13567008950740051557684122192308995314057566344300104593951542974637169184204129698994468544550663742935530027245528802936781135003283693033357154556486574476060392515064944249071831563073576715542578606382111717943010796357872815

---

## Challenge Technical Details
flag: flag{cxqni3rm}
cipher: RSA
ciphertext: 383156211816678983389275473613063567744660779324451990822330384877775004587658839226737088084616749567504224458218696008242326579195246905934525937587125257507868610607898079885107069198866427948319385427953594739627885412066120988
vulnerability: repeated primes
hint: The RSA modulus n is a perfect square. This often indicates a repeated prime usage vulnerability.
necessary_info: The flag format is flag{...}
n=612791716612396640556348893820829603210918281714267892829615255144300221245964882200958260222074257882858916318156072604739971428551225636436021634969328489033996757009589261386075700506668240578406025521936713510077874960613243849, e=13567008950740051557684122192308995314057566344300104593951542974637169184204129698994468544550663742935530027245528802936781135003283693033357154556486574476060392515064944249071831563073576715542578606382111717943010796357872815
extra_info: p=24754630205527139737393443674714153833414883334655889057972558621554666335724222962773860949025571127279055511596707, q=24754630205527139737393443674714153833414883334655889057972558621554666335724222962773860949025571127279055511596707, Ï†(n)=612791716612396640556348893820829603210918281714267892829615255144300221245964882200958260222074257882858916318156023095479560374271750849548672206661661659267327445231473316268832591173996792132480477800038662367823316849590050436
subtype: repeated_prime_usage
archetype: rsa
